punishment: Take two shots of your choice of alcohol.
Wear a silly costume or prop for the next round.
Drink half a cup of a mystery cocktail mixed by the group.
Perform a karaoke song of the group's choice.
Do a 60-second dance performance for the group.
Speak in an exaggerated accent for the next three turns.
Wear a funny mask for the next two rounds.
Take a drink for every player in the game.
Let someone draw a funny face on you with a marker.
Text a random contact in your phone saying something outrageous.
